text: Which sector does your enterprise belong to?

answers.text: Gathering of wild growing non-wood products

answerGroups.title: Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials

answers.text: Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials

Manufacture of other products of wood; manufacture of articles of cork, straw and plaiting materials

text: Does the furniture your enterprise is manufacturing contain textiles or leather?

Do you want a certificate that is recognized:
How would you define the size of your enterprise?

answers.text: Large enterprise (250 or more persons employed)

text: What is the timeframe for achieving the certificate

answers.text: Short term (e.g. in less than 2 months)

text: What level of investment in terms of time and resources (measured in person months) could you invest to obtain the certificate?
Are you interested into certifying your enterprise or products?

answers.text: an independent third party (to ensure impartiality)
a self-declaration (without any third-party verification of the declarations)

text: What environmental aspect are you trying to address with a certification? You can select more than one.
